## Checklist

- [ ] `pytest tests/ -v` — all tests pass
- [ ] Tested on a real cluster (required if touching `k8s/` manifests or BPF code)
- [ ] Tested platform and kernel version: <!-- e.g. K3s 1.34, Ubuntu 24.04, kernel 6.14 -->
- [ ] One concern per PR — no unrelated changes bundled in

### If adding platform support

- [ ] Platform guide added at `<platform>/README.md`
- [ ] Guide includes: prerequisites, deploy steps, verified output from a real cluster, troubleshooting
